p.k: After 5 star accommodation in Seattle the Racing Green engineers continue their epic journey across the USA. They meet a team of Zeromotorcycle who show them around San Francisco with electric bikes. They cruise along Highway No. 1, invite a police officer to test the SR-0, get lost in Las Vegas, drive across Hoover Dam and attend a high powered engineering convention in Austin Texas where they give a key note speech about their electric car experiences. Just before the Mexican border they have a first accident.
